Text: a/v? Is this actually good quality japanese voice with english subs? thanks

Video quality is nowhere near neither 720p nor 1884Kbps, it looks more like a 360p AVI, like a YouTube video, moreover it's heavily watermarked, and it has a symbol in the middle to right portion of the video. 

http://i.imgur.com/wD1V8fO.jpg

Actually it really looks like a low quality screen capture rather than a proper rip. And I'm pretty sure about it because you get windows from the desktop activities of the ripper popping out on the video. 

http://i.imgur.com/Y5FipnR.jpg

Audio is Japanese, with English subs, but is at leat 40mms out of sync. And it is nowhere near 192Kbps, it sounds metallic like a bad mp3.

Not worth downloading in my opinion. But it's free, so thanks anyways.
